*(1)* If you have errors with the Crypto. library, make sure you have installed the python-crypto package (was not preinstalled on Ubuntu Linux 8.10 Intrepid).

==Libraries used==
The releases above rely and contain the python modules: [http://www.lag.net/paramiko/ Paramiko] 1.7.4 and [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/simplejson simplejson 2.0.7].

==How Python files were packaged==

The Windows binary executables were packaged with [http://www.py2exe.org/ Py2Exe] and the Linux ones with [http://pyinstaller.python-hosting.com/ PyInstaller].

The "Full" build suite contains both the Windows and Unixes build scripts used for those "compiling" operations.
